data.title: Cliff Bradley & Sons Funeral Directors
data.meta_description: A comforting space for family and friends to pay their final respects, visitors to this section are welcome to leave theirs messages of condolence, or donate to a charity in their loved oneâ€™s memory.
data.text:
Leave a Message

Family members, friends and those who are grieving often find comfort in reading messages in memory of their loved one. Whether it be a story from the past, a short message of condolence, or a donation towards their chosen charity, it often means a lot to the family at a difficult and upsetting time.

Donating Online

Donating online is a quick and easy process, with all proceeds sent directly to the chosen charity. Simply click our donate buttons, enter your donation amount, then send a contribution by using your credit or debit card. Donations can also be made in person by visiting either of our funeral homes.
